Class SSLUtils

      • getHttpsClient

        public org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient getHttpsClient(ConnectionConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
                                                               throws ConnectionException
        Returns an instance of CloseableHttpClient
        Parameters:
        connectionConfiguration - has file path to SSL certificate, password to trust store or key
        Returns:
        CloseableHttpClient a closable Http client object returned
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - Exception in case of missing certificate file, invalid file path or invalid trust store or key key store
        See Also:
        CloseableHttpClient, ConnectionConfiguration
